steps.description: Save the document.

steps.name: Launch Paint Application
steps.description: Start the Paint application
steps.verification: Paint window is opened with title 'Untitled - Paint'

steps.name: Create New Canvas
steps.description: Create a new canvas in Paint application

actions.expected_result: New window with title 'Untitled - Paint' appears

steps.verification: Window title is updated to 'Untitled - Paint'

steps.name: Draw Rectangle for House Base
steps.description: Draw a rectangle for the house base using Paint application

actions.expected_result: Rectangle tool is selected in toolbar

steps.verification: Rectangle tool icon is highlighted in toolbar

steps.name: Draw Rectangle for House Walls
steps.description: Draw two rectangles for the house walls using Paint application

actions.expected_result: Second rectangle tool is selected in toolbar

steps.verification: Two rectangle tools are highlighted in toolbar

steps.name: Draw Rectangle for House Roof
steps.description: Draw a triangle for the house roof using Paint application

actions.expected_result: Triangle tool is selected in toolbar

steps.verification: Triangle tool icon is highlighted in toolbar

steps.name: Draw Door and Windows
steps.description: Draw a rectangle for the door and two small rectangles for the windows using Paint application

actions.expected_result: Third rectangle tool is selected in toolbar

steps.verification: Three rectangle tools are highlighted in toolbar

steps.name: Draw Final Touches
steps.description: Add final touches to the house drawing using Paint application

actions.expected_result: User has enough time to add final touches

steps.verification: House drawing is complete with final touches

steps.name: Launch Paint Program
steps.description: Open the Microsoft Paint application.
steps.verification: Window title is 'Microsoft Paint' and has a canvas

steps.name: Create New Canvas
steps.description: Create a new, blank canvas in Paint.
steps.verification: Canvas has a white background and no content

steps.name: Draw Rectangle for House
steps.description: Use the rectangle tool to draw the house's walls.

actions.expected_result: Rectangle tool is selected and cursor changes

steps.verification: Rectangle outline appears on canvas, with handles for resizing

steps.name: Draw Roof of House
steps.description: Use the rectangle tool to draw the house's roof.

actions.expected_result: Roof is drawn above the house

steps.verification: Roof is a triangle shape, with edges and corners

steps.name: Draw Door of House
steps.description: Use the rectangle tool to draw the house's door.

actions.expected_result: Door is drawn on the front of the house

steps.verification: Door is a rectangle shape, with edges and corners

steps.name: Draw Windows of House
steps.description: Use the ellipse tool to draw the house's windows.

actions.expected_result: Ellipse tool is selected and cursor changes

steps.verification: Elliptical shapes appear on the house, with edges and corners

steps.name: Save Drawing as Image
steps.description: Save the drawing as an image file.

actions.expected_result: Drawing is saved as house.png file

steps.verification: File 'house.png' exists in the same directory

steps.name: Launch Paint
steps.description: Open the Microsoft Paint application.
steps.verification: Verify that the Paint icon is on the screen and the window title is 'Paint'.

steps.name: Create a New Canvas
steps.description: Create a new canvas with dimensions 800x600.

actions.expected_result: A new canvas should be created with the specified dimensions.

steps.verification: Verify that a new canvas is created with the specified dimensions.

steps.name: Set Brush Properties
steps.description: Select a red brush with size 10 and opacity 50.

actions.expected_result: The selected color should be red with the specified properties.

steps.verification: Verify that the brush is set to the specified color.

steps.name: Draw a Rectangle
steps.description: Draw a rectangle at position (100, 100) with size 200x200.

actions.expected_result: A rectangle should be drawn at the specified position and size.
The rectangle should be visible on the canvas.

steps.verification: Verify that a rectangle is drawn at the specified position and size.

steps.name: Draw a Door
steps.description: Draw a door at position (300, 300) with size 50x100.

actions.expected_result: A door should be drawn at the specified position and size.
The door should be visible on the canvas.

steps.verification: Verify that a door is drawn at the specified position and size.

steps.name: Draw a Window
steps.description: Draw a window at position (400, 400) with size 50x100.

actions.expected_result: A window should be drawn at the specified position and size.
The window should be visible on the canvas.

steps.verification: Verify that a window is drawn at the specified position and size.

steps.name: Draw a Roof
steps.description: Draw a roof at position (500, 500) with size 100x50.

actions.expected_result: A roof should be drawn at the specified position and size.
The roof should be visible on the canvas.

steps.verification: Verify that a roof is drawn at the specified position and size.

steps.name: Save the Image
steps.description: Save the image as 'house.png'.

actions.expected_result: The image should be saved with the specified file name.

steps.verification: Verify that the image is saved with the specified file name.

steps.name: Launch Paint Program
steps.description: Open the Paint application on the computer.
steps.verification: Check for 'Paint' title in the taskbar.

steps.name: Select Brush Tool
steps.description: Switch to the brush tool within Paint.
steps.verification: Check for brush icon in the toolbar.

steps.name: Choose Color
steps.description: Select a color from the palette within Paint.
steps.verification: Check for color palette in the window.

steps.name: Draw Rectangle
steps.description: Use the brush tool to draw a rectangle on the canvas.

actions.expected_result: Rectangle is drawn on the canvas.

steps.verification: Check for rectangle shape in the window.

steps.name: Draw Door and Windows
steps.description: Use the brush tool to draw a door and two windows on the canvas.

actions.expected_result: Door is drawn on the canvas.
Window 1 is drawn on the canvas.
Window 2 is drawn on the canvas.

steps.verification: Check for door and two windows in the window.

steps.name: Draw Roof
steps.description: Use the brush tool to draw a roof on the canvas.

actions.expected_result: Roof is drawn on the canvas.

steps.verification: Check for roof shape in the window.

steps.name: Save File
steps.description: Save the drawing as a file on the computer.
steps.verification: Check for 'house.png' file in the directory.

steps.name: Create New Document

steps.name: Draw Rectangle for House
steps.description: Draw a rectangle to represent the house.
steps.verification: Rectangle is drawn on the canvas

steps.name: Draw Roof of House
steps.description: Draw a triangle to represent the roof.

actions.expected_result: Triangle is drawn on top of rectangle

steps.verification: Triangle is drawn on top of rectangle

steps.name: Draw Windows and Door
steps.description: Draw circles for windows and a rectangle for the door.
steps.verification: Circles are drawn for windows and rectangle for door

steps.name: Save the Drawing

steps.verification: Drawing is saved as an image file

steps.description: Draw a rectangle on the canvas using the drawing tools.
